<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Board of Directors
Compensation</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Each independent non employee director of the Company receives $24,000
per year, payable quarterly, and is reimbursed for out of pocket expenses
incurred in attending meetings.&#160; Each
member of the Audit Committee and the Compensation and Stock Option Committee
receives an additional $500 per Committee meeting attended.&#160; In addition, Mr.&nbsp;Rogers, as Chairman of
the Audit Committee, receives $6,000 per year.&#160;
Also, in 2005, Messrs.&nbsp;Kasun and Rogers each received $24,000 for
their services on a special committee of independent directors formed to
explore the possibility of entering into a &#147;going private&#148; transaction and
subsequently to analyze a proposal by Angostura to purchase additional common
stock in the Company.&#160; Of these special
committee fees, a total of $24,000 was reimbursed to the Company by
Angostura.&#160; In addition, in 2005, Messrs.&nbsp;Kasun,
Rogers and McDonnell each received $36,000 for their services on a special
committee of independent directors formed for the purpose of considering the
sale of Angostura&#146;s controlling stake in the Company, as well as to consider
any business combination proposal from V&amp;S.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h4 style="color:black;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">COMPENSATION AND STOCK OPTION COMMITTEE
REPORT</font></b></h4>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Compensation
Philosophy</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The philosophy
of the Company&#146;s Compensation and Stock Option Committee (the &#147;Committee&#148;) for
Fiscal 2005 was to provide competitive levels of compensation, link management&#146;s
pay to the achievement of the Company&#146;s annual and long-term performance goals,
reward above average corporate performance, recognize individual initiative and
achievement, and assist the Company in attracting and retaining qualified
management.&#160; Management compensation was
intended to be set at levels that the Committee believes is consistent with others
in the Company&#146;s industry (beverage alcohol and bottling), with senior
management&#146;s compensation packages being weighted toward programs contingent
upon the Company&#146;s level of performance.&#160;
However, because of the limited number of companies that can be compared
to the Company in terms of product mix, net sales, net income, and similar
items, a significant amount of subjectivity was involved in the Committee&#146;s
decisions.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Base Salaries</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Base salaries
for new management employees are determined initially by evaluating the
responsibilities of the position held and the experience of the individual, and
by reference to the competitive marketplace for management talent, including a
comparison of base salaries for comparable positions at comparable companies within
the beverage alcohol industry.&#160; Annual
salary adjustments are determined by evaluating the competitive marketplace,
the performance of the Company, the performance of the executive, and any
increased responsibilities assumed by the executive.&#160; The Committee believes the base salaries of
executive officers are at or below those of similar companies in the beverage
alcohol industry.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bonus Arrangement</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To encourage
and reward outstanding corporate and individual performance, the Company has
adopted a discretionary bonus arrangement for its executive officers, subject
to minimum levels in each of the top five executive officer&#146;s employment
agreements, based on the Company&#146;s operating results and the achievement of
certain defined major business objectives.&#160;
Bonuses are paid on an annual basis based on the results during the past
fiscal year.&#160; The Company anticipates
that it will continue to maintain a discretionary bonus arrangement for its
executive officers during the current year and thereafter.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Compensation of
Chief Executive Officer</font></b></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Pursuant to an
employment agreement with the Company, the Company&#146;s Chief Executive Officer is
entitled to a minimum base salary, subject to increases at the discretion of
the Board of Directors.&#160; The Committee
may recommend to the Board of Directors increases in base compensation to the
Company&#146;s Chief Executive Officer based upon quantitative and qualitative
factors, including: (i)&nbsp;the Company&#146;s financial performance, including but
not limited to the Company&#146;s gross sales, gross profit and net earnings; (ii)&nbsp;the
Chief Executive Officer&#146;s level of leadership and responsibility for the
management, operation and growth of the Company, including his experience in
the beverage alcohol industry and his ability to locate, negotiate and
consummate growth-oriented acquisitions of other companies; and (iii)&nbsp;the
Company&#146;s compensation philosophy for management generally.&#160; In addition, under his employment agreement,
the Chief Executive Officer is entitled to a minimum annual bonus, subject to
increases</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">36</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='36',FILE='C:\JMS\jbritto\05-18427-1\task744209\18427-1-ba-03.htm',USER='jbritto',CD='Jan 12 03:14 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">at the discretion of the Board
of Directors.&#160; The amount of the Chief
Executive Officer&#146;s annual base salary and bonus were determined in accordance
with the principles discussed in this paragraph and were based upon a
subjective evaluation by the Committee of the leadership demonstrated during
the past 12 months.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Employee Stock
Option Plans</font></b></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Board of
Directors endorses the position that equity ownership by management is beneficial
in aligning management&#146;s and stockholders&#146; interests in the enhancement of
stockholder value.&#160; The Company
originally adopted an employee stock option plan in 1992 and amended it in 1995
and 1997 (the &#147;1992 Option Plan&#148;).&#160; The
1992 Option Plan authorized the grant of options to key employees (including
officers and directors) and consultants and independent contractors of the
Company or any subsidiaries.&#160; Options
granted under the 1992 Option Plan were either incentive or non-statutory stock
options.&#160; A total of 1,400,000 shares of
Common Stock was initially reserved for issuance under the 1992 Option Plan,
and as of September&nbsp;30, 2005, there were options outstanding to purchase
312,500 shares of the Company common stock, which expire through December&nbsp;2008.&#160; In Fiscal 2004, the Company adopted a new
employee stock option plan (the &#147;2004 Option Plan&#148;), and as of September&nbsp;30,
2005, 304,000 shares of Common Stock are available for future issuance under
the 2004 Option Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The 2004
Option Plan is administered by the Committee, which has full authority to
determine the individuals who are eligible to receive option grants, the number
of shares to be covered by each such option, the time or times at which an
option is to be exercisable, the maximum term the option is to be outstanding,
and whether or not the option granted is to be an incentive stock option.&#160; The Committee also has the authority to grant
stock appreciation rights entitling the grantee to surrender an unexercised
option in exchange for a cash distribution from the Company equal to the
difference between the fair market value of the shares represented by such
option and the exercise price payable for such shares.&#160; No Board member may serve on the Committee if
he has been granted options or stock appreciation rights pursuant to the 2004
Option Plan during the previous year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Supplemental
Executive Retirement Program</font></b></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Committee
has approved a SERP to provide death benefits, retirement benefits and
disability benefits to certain executive officers of the Company, including the
executive officers named in the Summary Compensation Table.&#160; The objective of the SERP is to encourage the
executives to remain in the service of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Pension Plan</font></b></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company
has a defined contribution pension plan.&#160;
Generally, all employees age 21 and over become eligible to participate
in the pension plan after one year of service with the Company.&#160; Participants may make contributions based on
their eligible compensation and are immediately vested in their contributions
and related earnings, if any.&#160; Generally,
employer contributions begin to vest to the benefit of the participant after
three years of service.&#160; The Company
contributed $1,228,385, $1,206,986 and $967,962 to the plan for the years ended
September&nbsp;30, 2005, 2004 and 2003, respectively.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Donald L. Kasun</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Leonard&nbsp;G. Rogers</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h4 style="color:black;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">PERFORMANCE GRAPH</font></b></h4>

<h4 style="color:black;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h4>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following
performance graph compares the performance of the Company&#146;s Common Stock for
each month in the five-year period ended September&nbsp;30, 2005, to the Center
for Research in Securities Prices of the University of Chicago Graduate School
of Business (&#147;CRSP&#148;) index for the Amex Stock Market (United States Companies)
and a peer group index.&#160; The peer group
index&#146;s returns have been weighted based on market capitalization (see Note B
to the performance graph).&#160; The
performance graph assumes a $100 investment in the Company&#146;s Common Stock, and
in each of the indices, on September&nbsp;30, 2000, and a reinvestment of all
dividends.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">37</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='37',FILE='C:\JMS\jbritto\05-18427-1\task744209\18427-1-ba-03.htm',USER='jbritto',CD='Jan 12 03:14 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Comparison
of Five-Year Cumulative Total Return of<br>
Cruzan International,&nbsp;Inc.,<br>
The Amex Stock Market Index, and<br>
Peer Group Index</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="608" height="640" src="g184271ba03i001.gif"></font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Peer Group Index is comprised of the following companies:
Brown-Forman Corporation (Class&nbsp;B Shares), The Chalone Wine Group, Ltd.,
Constellation Brands,&nbsp;Inc., MGP Ingredients,&nbsp;Inc., Penford
Corporation, Pyramid Breweries,&nbsp;Inc., Redhook Ale Brewery, Incorporated,
Scheid Vineyards Inc., Cruzan International,&nbsp;Inc. and Triarc Companies
Inc.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">38</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Item 12.&#160; Security Ownership of Certain Beneficial
Owners and Management and Related Stockholder Matters</font></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h4 style="color:black;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">EQUITY COMPENSATION PLAN INFORMATION</font></b></h4>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following
table summarizes information about the Company&#146;s equity compensation plans as
of September&nbsp;30, 2005. All outstanding awards relate to the Company&#146;s
Common Stock.&#160; For additional information
about the Company&#146;s equity compensation plans, see Note 12 to the Company&#146;s
consolidated financial statements.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="16%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:16.88%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.82</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="21%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:21.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">304,000</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left">

</font></div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">All of the shares reported in this row
reflect stock options granted under the Company&#146;s 1992 Employee Stock Option
Plan, as amended.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">All of the shares reported in this row
reflect stock options granted under the Company&#146;s 2004 Employee Stock Option
Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h4 style="color:black;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">PRINCIPAL STOCKHOLDERS AND BENEFICIAL
OWNERSHIP OF MANAGEMENT</font></b></h4>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following tables set forth information at
December&nbsp;2, 2005 with respect to the beneficial ownership of shares of
Common Stock by (i)&nbsp;the directors of the Company, (ii)&nbsp;the Chief
Executive Officer and the four other most highly compensated executive officers
who were serving as executive officers on September&nbsp;30, 2005, (iii)&nbsp;all
executive officers and directors of the Company, as a group, and (iv)&nbsp;each
person known to the Company to beneficially own more than 5% of the shares of
Common Stock outstanding.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">39</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:13.86%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Presently<br>
  Exercisable<br>
  Options(1)</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="14%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:14.66%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Total<br>

  Ownership</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.12%;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left">

</font></div>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The number of
shares beneficially owned by each director, executive officer and stockholder
is determined under rules&nbsp;of the Commission, and the information provided
under those rules&nbsp;is not necessarily indicative of beneficial ownership
for any other purpose. Under those rules, beneficial ownership includes any
shares as to which the individual has sole or shared voting power or investment
power and any shares that the individual has the right to acquire within 60
days after December&nbsp;2,<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b>2005, including
through the exercise of options granted under the Company&#146;s 1992 Employee Stock
Option Plan and 2004 Stock Option Plan (&#147;Presently Exercisable Options&#148;). The
inclusion of shares covered by Presently Exercisable Options, however, does not
constitute an admission that the named stockholder is a direct or indirect
beneficial owner of such shares. Unless otherwise indicated, each person or
entity named in the table has sole voting power and investment power (or shares
such power with his spouse) with respect to all shares of Common Stock listed
as owned by such person or entity. Unless otherwise stated, the address for
each executive officer or Director is the Company&#146;s principal office, 222
Lakeview Avenue, Suite&nbsp;1500, West Palm Beach, Florida 33401.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Number of shares
outstanding consists of the 6,748,992
shares of Common Stock outstanding at November&nbsp;15, 2005, plus any shares
subject to Presently Exercisable Options held by the person in question.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Mr.&nbsp;Kasun&#146;s
address is 1080&nbsp;N.&nbsp;Ocean Boulevard, Palm Beach, Florida 33480.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(4)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Mr.&nbsp;McDonnell&#146;s
address is The Premier Group, 10&nbsp;Office Park Road, Suite&nbsp;212, Hilton
Head Island, South Carolina 29928.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(5)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Mr.&nbsp;Rogers&#146;
address is 575&nbsp;Island Drive, Palm Beach, Florida 33480.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(6)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ASCI has reported
in a Schedule&nbsp;13D/A that, as of September&nbsp;26, 2005, it beneficially
owned, and had sole voting and investment power with respect to, 4,294,583
shares of the Company&#146;s Common Stock.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">40</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='40',FILE='C:\JMS\jbritto\05-18427-1\task744209\18427-1-ba-03.htm',USER='jbritto',CD='Jan 12 03:14 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(7)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ASCI is a
wholly-owned subsidiary of V&amp;S, a company incorporated in Sweden and
wholly-owned by the Kingdom of Sweden.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Change in Control</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On June&nbsp;3, 2005, the Company announced
that Angostura, the Company&#146;s then controlling stockholder, had entered into a
Stock Purchase Agreement with V&amp;S pursuant to which V&amp;S agreed to
purchase Angostura&#146;s controlling interest in the Company.&#160; Upon the terms and subject to the conditions
set forth in the Stock Purchase Agreement, V&amp;S agreed to purchase all
4,294,583 shares of the Company&#146;s common stock beneficially owned by Angostura,
representing approximately 63.6% of the Company&#146;s outstanding common stock, for
an aggregate consideration of $121,837,320, or $28.37 per share.&#160; V&amp;S subsequently assigned its rights in
the Stock Purchase Agreement to ASCI.&#160;
The purchase and sale closed on September&nbsp;26, 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On July&nbsp;8, 2005, the Company announced
that ASCI had submitted a proposed Agreement and Plan of Merger pursuant to
which a wholly-owned subsidiary of ASCI would merge with and into the Company,
and each issued share of Company common stock not owned by Angostura would be
converted into the right to receive $28.37 in cash.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On September&nbsp;30, 2005, the Company,
ASCI,&#160; and Cruzan Acquisition,&nbsp;Inc.,
a Delaware corporation and a direct, wholly-owned subsidiary of ASCI (&#147;Sub&#148;),
entered into an Agreement and Plan of Merger.&#160;
The Merger Agreement provides that, upon the terms and subject to the
conditions set forth in the Merger Agreement, Sub will merge with and into the
Company, with the Company continuing as the surviving corporation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On December&nbsp;1, 2005, the Company filed a
preliminary proxy statement and other relevant documents concerning the
Commission and intends to call a Special Meeting of its stockholders to vote on
the Merger.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Pursuant to
the Merger Agreement, all fees and expenses incurred in connection with the
Merger will be paid by the party incurring those expenses, whether or not the
Merger is completed.&#160; The Merger
Agreement also provides that upon a termination in specified circumstances, the
Company must pay a termination fee of $3 million to ASCI.&#160; In addition, if ASCI terminates the Merger
Agreement in specified circumstances, the Company would be obligated to
reimburse ASCI for all of its documented out-of-pocket expenses actually incurred
up to a maximum of $1.5 million in connection with the Merger Agreement or the
Merger.&#160; The termination fee is subject
to a credit for any expense reimbursement paid and no expense reimbursement
shall be due if the Company has previously paid the termination fee.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Pursuant to a
letter agreement entered into between Angostura and certain of the Company&#146;s
management on June&nbsp;2, 2005, Angostura agreed to pay to certain of the
Company&#146;s management an aggregate amount of $9 million if the sale of Angostura&#146;s
controlling interest in the Company to ASCI were completed.&#160; Although this sale was completed on September&nbsp;26,
2005, as of December&nbsp;16, 2005, this payment has not been made.&#160; This payment is not the obligation of the
Company and was negotiated between certain members of management and the former
majority owner without the participation of or ratification by the Company&#146;s
board of directors or any committee thereof and does not affect the Company&#146;s
balance sheet or cash flow statement.&#160;
However, under Staff Accounting Bulletin 107 issued by the Commission
relating to accounting for expenses or liabilities paid by principal
stockholder(s), this expected payment by Angostura was treated as an expense of
the Company in the statement of operations, and as a contribution to additional
paid-in capital on the balance sheet.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Item 13.&#160; Certain Relationships and Related
Transactions</font></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Each of the
Company and Mr.&nbsp;McDonnell owns a 45% interest in Premier Wines&nbsp;&amp;
Spirits, Ltd. (&#147;Premier&#148;).&#160; The Company
had sales to Premier during Fiscal 2005 of approximately $2,540,000, of which
approximately $548,000 is included in trade receivables as of September&nbsp;30,
2005.&#160; Also, the Company has advanced
$787,019 and Mr.&nbsp;McDonnell has advanced $587,019 to Premier; the amount of
the Company&#146;s advance is included in investments and advances to equity
investees as of September&nbsp;30, 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On October&nbsp;10,
2003, the Company entered into a Distribution Agreement with V&amp;S.&#160; Pursuant to the terms of the agreement,
V&amp;S acts as the sole and exclusive distributor for Cruzan products in
Denmark, Finland, Norway, Sweden, Estonia, Poland, Czech Republic, Slovakia,
Canada and all global duty free and travel retail arkets</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">41</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='41',FILE='C:\JMS\jbritto\05-18427-1\task744209\18427-1-ba-03.htm',USER='jbritto',CD='Jan 12 03:14 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">other than those located in the
U.S., Caribbean, Bermuda, Philippines and Israel.&#160; V&amp;S pays the Company a royalty in an
amount equal to 50% of V&amp;S&#146; revenue from the sale of the Company&#146;s products
excluding all taxes, excise duties, rebates and discounts, less (i)&nbsp;V&amp;S&#146;
selling costs, and (ii)&nbsp;the purchase price paid for the Company&#146;s
products, which are sold at cost.&#160; In
addition, the Distribution Agreement provides that the Company will share in
50% of the advertising and promotion costs in promoting Cruzan Rum.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the
year ended September&nbsp;30, 2005, the Company had sales to V&amp;S under the
Distribution Agreement of $829,828, of which $354,920 is included in accounts
receivable.&#160; Also, the Company incurred
$1,016,479 of advertising and promotion costs related to the Distribution
Agreement, of which $596,861 is included in accrued expenses.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Item 14.&#160; Principal Accountant Fees and Services</font></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Audit and
Non-Audit Fees</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .1pt;text-indent:35.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following
table presents fees for audit services rendered by McGladrey&nbsp;&amp; Pullen,
LLP for the audit of the Company&#146;s annual financial statements for the years
ended September&nbsp;30, 2005 and 2004 and fees billed for other services
rendered by McGladrey&nbsp;&amp; Pullen, LLP and its affiliate RSM McGladery,&nbsp;Inc.
during those periods. </font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align="center">

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="60%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:60.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="39%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:39.82%;">

  </td>
  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:4.44%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

  </td>
  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:4.44%;">

  </td>
  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:4.44%;">

 <tr>
  <td width="39%" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:39.82%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Audit Fees
  (1)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:4.44%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.16%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="21%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:21.26%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">378,425</font></p>
  </td>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left">

</font></div>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Audit
Fees &#150; Audit fees billed to the Company by McGladrey&nbsp;&amp; Pullen, LLP for
auditing the Company&#146;s annual financial statements and reviewing the financial
statements included in the Company&#146;s Quarterly Reports on Form&nbsp;10-Q.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Audit-Related
Fees &#150; Audit-related fees billed to the Company by McGladrey&nbsp;&amp; Pullen,
LLP include fees related to the audit of the Company&#146;s employee benefit plan,
accounting consultations and due diligence procedures related to merger and
acquisition activity.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Tax
Service Fees &#150; Tax service fees billed to the Company by RSM McGladrey,&nbsp;Inc.
include fees related to the preparation of the Company&#146;s original and amended
tax returns, claims for refunds, payment-planning services and tax advice
related to employee benefit plans and merger and acquisition activity.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(4)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>All
Other Fees &#150; All other fees billed to the Company by McGladrey&nbsp;&amp;
Pullen, LLP and its affiliate RSM McGladery,&nbsp;Inc. include fees related to
the design of the Company&#146;s employee benefit plans, review of S-2 filing and
assistance with response to the Commission comment letter.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Policy on Audit
Committee Pre-Approval of Audit and Non-Audit Services of Independent Auditor</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Audit Committee&#146;s policy is to
pre-approve all audit and non-audit services provided by the independent
auditors. These services may include audit services, audit-related services,
tax services and other services.&#160;
Pre-approval is generally provided for up to 12 months from the date of
pre-approval and any pre-approval is detailed as to the particular service or
category of services and is generally subject to a specific budget. The Audit
Committee may delegate pre-approval authority to one or more of its members
when expedition of services is necessary. The independent auditors and
management are required to periodically report to the full Audit Committee
regarding the extent of services provided by the independent auditors in
accordance with this pre-approval, and the fees for the services performed to
date.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Audit Committee has determined that the
provision of non-audit services by McGladrey&nbsp;&amp; Pullen, LLP and its
affiliate RSM McGladery,&nbsp;Inc. is compatible with maintaining McGladrey&nbsp;&amp;
Pullen, LLP&#146;s independence.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">42</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">PART&nbsp;IV</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Item 15.&#160; Exhibits and Financial Statement Schedules</font></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Financial
Statements and Financial Statement Schedules</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">See &#147;Index to Financial Statements and
Financial Statement Schedules.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Exhibits</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">See &#147;Index to Exhibits.&#148;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">43</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h4 style="color:black;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">SIGNATURES</font></b></h4>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Pursuant to the requirements of Section&nbsp;13
or 15(d)&nbsp;of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly
caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned, thereunto
duly authorized, in the City of West Palm Beach, State of Florida, on the 16th
day of December, 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="49%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CRUZAN INTERNATIONAL, INC.</font></p>
  </td>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CRUZAN INTERNATIONAL, INC.</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">INDEX TO FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND FINANCIAL
STATEMENT SCHEDULES</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.28%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="89%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:89.44%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.74%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Page</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.54%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.28%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="89%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:89.44%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Financial
  Statements</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.74%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.54%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.28%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="89%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:89.44%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#ReportOfIndependentRegisteredPubl_191916">Report of Independent
  Registered Public Accounting Firm</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.74%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#ReportOfIndependentRegisteredPubl_191916">46</a></font></p>
  </td>

 </tr>

  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.28%;">

  <td width="89%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:89.44%;">

  September&nbsp;30, 2005 and 2004</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.74%;">

  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.54%;">

  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.28%;">

  </td>
  <td width="89%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:89.44%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#ConsolidatedStatementsOfOperation_191925">Consolidated statements of
  operations for the years ended September&nbsp;30, 2005, 2004 and 2003</a></font></p>

  </td>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='45',FILE='C:\JMS\jbritto\05-18427-1\task744209\18427-1-ba-05.htm',USER='jbritto',CD='Jan 12 03:13 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img border="0" width="210" height="62" src="g184271ba05i001.jpg"></font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><a name="ReportOfIndependentRegisteredPubl_191916"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Report of Independent Registered
Public Accounting Firm</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To the Board of Directors
and Stockholders</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Cruzan International,&nbsp;Inc.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">West Palm Beach, Florida</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">We have audited the
consolidated balance sheets of Cruzan International,&nbsp;Inc. and subsidiaries
as of September&nbsp;30, 2005 and 2004, and the related consolidated statements
of operations, stockholders&#146; equity and cash flows for each of the three years
in the period ended September&nbsp;30, 2005.&#160;
These financial statements are the responsibility of the Company&#146;s
management.&#160; Our responsibility is to
express an opinion on these financial statements based on our audits.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">We conducted our audits
in accordance with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight
Board (United States).&#160; Those standards
require that we plan and perform the audit to obtain reasonable assurance about
whether the financial statements are free of material misstatement.&#160; An audit includes examining, on a test basis,
evidence supporting the amounts and disclosures in the financial
statements.&#160; An audit also includes
assessing the accounting principles used and significant estimates made by
management, as well as evaluating the overall financial statement presentation.&#160; We believe that our audits provided a reasonable
basis for our opinion.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In our opinion, the
consolidated financial statements referred to above present fairly, in all
material respects, the financial position of Cruzan International,&nbsp;Inc.
and subsidiaries as of September&nbsp;30, 2005 and 2004, and the results of
their operations and their cash flows for each of the three years in the period
ended September&nbsp;30, 2005 in conformity with U.S. generally accepted
accounting principles.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="69%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:69.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="30%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:30.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">/s/ McGladrey &amp; Pullen, LLP</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:100.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">West Palm Beach,
  Florida</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:100.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">November&nbsp;18, 2005, except for (ii)&nbsp;of
  Note 9 and</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:100.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Note 21, as to which the date is December&nbsp;16,
  2005</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">McGladrey&nbsp;&amp;
Pullen, LLP is a member firm of RSM International, an affiliation of separate
and independent legal entities.</font></p>

</font></div>

  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:8.6%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:7.0pt;font-weight:bold;">99,200</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:7.0pt;font-weight:bold;">$</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.3%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:7.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(737,780</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:7.0pt;font-weight:bold;">)</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:7.0pt;font-weight:bold;">83,652,278</font></b></p>
  </td>

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.1%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">$</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.42%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#151;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.1%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.42%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#151;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.1%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.42%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">500,000</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">See Notes to Consolidated Financial Statements.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">52</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
